issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

In my opinion, separators should be rendered between two table view rows, but not to the bottom of the last row. This is not intuitive and also makes necessary a hack to prevent the juxtaposition of the bottom border of the table view with this last separator.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: Table view separator applies to the bottom of the last row

comments.body: We will not fix this, because it is the native behavior of iOS.
